data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Reyes, Jhoe, Brusa, Francisco (2017): Species of Macrostomum (Macrostomorpha: Macrostomidae) from the coastal region of Lima, Peru, with comments on M. rostratum Papi, 1951. Zootaxa 4362 (2), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.2.4|1 occurrence
